pinyin: gao1 guo3 tang2 yu4 mi3 tang2 jiang1

sentences.english: Fructosamine may be more appropriate in this setting.
sentences.chinese: 这种情况下，果糖胺可能更实用。

sentences.english: Effect of 1,6-fructose diphosphate in 119 cases of cerebral infarction.
sentences.chinese: 二磷酸果糖治疗119例脑梗死患者的疗效观察。

sentences.english: Differential effects of honey, sucrose, and fructose on blood sugar levels(Shambaugh et al. , 1990)
sentences.chinese: 蜂蜜，蔗糖，果糖对血糖水平的影响。

sentences.english: In fact, two very popular beverages have crystalline fructose (sugar) as the second ingredient.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，两种流行饮品把结晶果糖作为其第二种原料。

sentences.english: Are you worried about high-fructose corn syrup in your diet?
sentences.chinese: 您是否在担心饮食中的高果糖玉米糖浆呢？

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish rat models with insulin resistance syndrome induced by high-fructose diet.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立高果糖餐诱导的胰岛素抵抗综合征大鼠模型。

sentences.english: We’re getting you fruit and a lollipop. There’s no milk in that.
sentences.chinese: “我们去买水果糖和棒棒糖，那里面没有牛奶”。

sentences.english: Even some breads have fructose from the corn syrup additive.
sentences.chinese: 甚至面包也添加了这种玉米中的果糖。

sentences.english: The bottom line is we should be consuming a lot less of both sugar and high-fructose corn syrup.
sentences.chinese: 底线是我们应该摄入尽量少的糖和高果糖玉米糖浆。

sentences.english: In the days of material scarcity, we could only afford to buy 100 grams of peanuts, some sunflower seeds and some fruit candies.
sentences.chinese: 物质匮乏的时候只能买二两花生，瓜子和水果糖。

sentences.english: The complex sugars in fruit are an important part to any diet.
sentences.chinese: 复杂的一个重要组成部分水果糖任何饮食。

sentences.english: In the days of material scarcity, we could only afford to buy 100 grams of peanuts, some sunflower seeds and some fruit candies. Nowadays, we enjoy all kinds of goods.
sentences.chinese: 物质匮乏的时候只能买二两花生，瓜子和水果糖。

sentences.english: Fructose and glucose are the components of the disaccharide sucrose (table sugar);
sentences.chinese: 果糖和葡萄糖均为蔗糖的组分。

sentences.english: Burley found labeled glucose and fructose in equimolar amounts.
sentences.chinese: 波里发现等克分子量的示踪葡萄糖和果糖。

sentences.english: The urinary concentrations of lactulose and mannitol were determined by a refractive index detector .
sentences.chinese: 上用示差检测器测定尿液中乳果糖和甘露醇的浓度。

sentences.english: The results 'support the importance of reducing fructose intake', the experts said.
sentences.chinese: 专家说，研究结果鼓励更多人减少果糖摄取量。

definition: polysaccharide (complex carbohydrate such as starch 澱粉|淀粉 and cellulose 纖維素|纤维素)
